014package org.microbean.scope;
015
016import java.util.Objects;
017
018import org.microbean.qualifier.NamedAttributeMap;
019
020@FunctionalInterface
021public interface ScopeMember {
022
023  public NamedAttributeMap<?> governingScopeId();
024
025  public default boolean governedBy(final NamedAttributeMap<?> governingScopeId) {
026    return Objects.equals(this.governingScopeId(), governingScopeId);
027  }
028
029}
